name: Cookie Rush
description:
Will you be the first to grab the cookie?

Cookie Rush is a wild and fun racing game in which a red panda and a raccoon go head-to-head. Speed and strategy will be needed in this competitive 2 players games to get the precious cookie. All your dexterity will be required in the various bonus mini games imagined.

Created by Martin Maigret & Alexandre Brull in a self-study project, Cookie Rush is a production of the belgium studio N-Zone. This video game is also an extension of the board game Cookie Addict (edited by Lubee in 2020).

  • Playable directly on your web browser
  • Engine: Unity 3D
  • Number of players: 2

The Cookie Rush application is also coming on Android !

 

Find more information on the cookie addict board game on:

https://www.lubee-edition.com/fr

Find us on :

https://www.facebook.com/LubeeEdition/?redirect=false

https://www.instagram.com/lubee_edition/

 
Lvl: Hide&Seek

Find the right cookie among the fake ones

  

Lvl: Shiny Unicorn

Collect more than half the cookies


Lvl: Ghost House

Avoid ghost walls to access the cookie


Lvl: Marionito

Move like you were on a platform to catch the cookie

 

Lvl: 123 SUN!

Try not to get carried away by the wind


Lvl: Fight

Push your opponent into traps to win

 

Lvl: Soccer

 Hit the cookie to send it into your opponent's goal
